named-query.name: Bill.selectPendingByReceiverInRange
named-query.query: select b from Bill b where b.receiver = :receiver and b.dateFrom >= :from and b.dateTo <= :to and b.liquidation is null

named-query.name: Bill.selectByStoreInRange
named-query.query: select b from Bill b where b.sender = :sender and b.dateFrom >= :from and b.dateTo <= :to

named-query.name: User.login
named-query.query: select e from User e where e.alias = :key or e.email = :key

named-query.name: User.validateSession
named-query.query: select e.expiration from UserSession e where e.session = :sessionId

named-query.name: User.deleteSession
named-query.query: delete from UserSession e where e.user = :user

named-query.name: User.touchSession
named-query.query: update UserSession set lastAccess = :lastAccess, expiration = :expiration where session = :sessionId
